TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {746=February is Black History Month, and to celebrate, the Pop Shop presents a tribute to AM soul. Billy Paul, Billy Preston, Bill Withers, Earth, Wind & Fire, Sly & the Family Stone and more. Plus, DJ Izzy Senior joins the show with select favorites.}

textBeforeTable: Playlist Tracks:  February is Black History Month, and to celebrate, the Pop Shop presents a tribute to AM soul. Billy Paul, Billy Preston, Bill Withers, Earth, Wind & Fire, Sly & the Family Stone and more. Plus, DJ Izzy Senior joins the show with select favorites.
